plant.question: I have roots, but no legs. I wear a green coat, but have no arms. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I grow in the ground
☀️ I need sunshine to live
🌳 I can be very tall

plant.question: I am small and green. I grow in your garden. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥬 I am a vegetable
🐰 I am a yummy snack for bunnies
🥗 I am often found in salads

plant.question: I am a colorful flower. Bees love to visit me. I often grow in bouquets. What am I?

hints.text: 🌷 I come in many colors
🐝 I help bees make honey
💐 I am a popular gift

plant.question: I have a trunk, but carry no clothes. I have leaves, but am not a book. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I am made of wood
🍃 I lose my leaves in the fall
🦉 Animals can live inside of me

plant.question: I grow in water, but I am not a fish. I have a stem, but cannot walk. I am often found in ponds. What am I?

hints.text: 🐸 Frogs like to sit on me
💧 I float on the water's surface
🌸 Some of us are very pretty and pink

plant.question: I am a plant that can sting you. I have tiny hairs that cause itching. What am I?

hints.text: 🤕 It's best to avoid touching me
🌿 I grow in the wild
🧴 Calamine lotion can help with the itch

plant.question: I am a tall plant with a thick stalk. My kernels are a popular snack when popped. What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 I am often grown in fields
🍿 My kernels can be turned into a movie treat
🧑‍🌾 Farmers harvest me in the fall

plant.question: I'm a seed that's used to make a popular drink. I grow on a tree in warm places. What am I?

hints.text: ☕ People like to drink me in the morning.
🌎 I'm grown in places like Brazil and Colombia.
🔥 I need to be roasted before you grind me.

plant.question: I'm a plant that can live for a very long time, and I grow rings each year, which can show how old I am. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I'm very tall and strong.
🍁 My leaves change color in the autumn.
🌳 You can count my rings to know how long I've lived.

plant.question: I am a plant that eats insects. I trap them in my sticky leaves. What am I?

hints.text: 🪰 Flies are my favorite snack
🧪 I can survive in nutrient poor soil
🌍 I am a carnivorous plant

food.question: I am yellow and long, monkeys love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌴 I grow on trees in warm places.
💛 My peel is easy to remove.
💪 I'm a good source of potassium!

food.question: I am white and come from a cow. You can drink me or put me on your cereal. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I am often kept in the fridge.
🦴 I am good for your bones.
🍪 I go great with cookies!

food.question: I am round and often red, but sometimes green or yellow. An apple a day keeps the doctor away. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I grow on trees.
🍎 I can be used to make juice or pie.
🐛 Sometimes a worm lives in me!

food.question: I am orange and crunchy. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am a root vegetable.
👀 People say I'm good for your eyesight.
🥗 I am great in salads!

food.question: I am small and green. I grow in a pod. You might eat me with butter. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I am a type of legume.
🍲 I can be cooked in many ways.
🌎 Some people eat me as a side dish.

food.question: I am made from wheat and baked in an oven. You can make sandwiches with me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I am often sliced.
🥪 I come in different shapes, sizes, and colors.
🍞 Toasting me makes me crunchy!

food.question: I am a fruit with a fuzzy skin. I am green inside and grow in New Zealand. What am I?

hints.text: 🥝 I am often added to fruit salads.
🥄 You can eat me with a spoon.
🐻 I share my name with a flightless bird!

food.question: I am a vegetable that makes people cry when you cut me. What am I?

hints.text: 🧅 I have layers.
🍔 I can be cooked or eaten raw.
😩 My strong smell can water your eyes!

food.question: I am a dairy product that is fermented, often eaten with fruit. What am I?

hints.text: 🥄 I am a creamy treat!
🐄 I am made from milk, but not plain milk.
💪 I am a good source of protein and calcium.

food.question: I am a type of food, often round, that is made from dough with toppings like tomato sauce and cheese, and baked in an oven. What am I?

hints.text: 🍕 I am often cut into slices.
🍄 My toppings can include vegetables and meat.
🇮🇹 I am a popular dish in Italy!
